Unsealing a Rasengan from his [[Rinnegan]], Momoshiki amplifies the chakra giving it a red colour and to increase its size to a giant scale, which rivals [[Boruto Uzumaki]]'s own [[Parent and Child Rasengan|amplified Rasengan]].

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in the movie and anime, this technique was named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4]]''.
* Before Momoshiki obtained this Rasengan, it originally belonged to [[Konohamaru Sarutobi]], who sealed it into [[Katasuke]]'s [[Kote]].<ref>''Boruto: Naruto the Movie'' novel</ref>
